name: sineLABS LLC
description:
Who We Are
A team of expert Shopify developers based in sunny, historic Charleston, SC, USA.
What We Do
Shopify, Shopify, Shopify. From small tweaks and enhancements on existing themes to completely custom themes and private apps, sineLABS has the expertise to get your Shopify job done.
Our Core Values
sineLABS is one of the top-ranked partners on the Shopify Experts portal, and we chalk this up to our core values. We take pride in our attention to detail, meeting deadlines, proactive communication, and professional customer service.
